The Ordinance Committee will meet to conduct a public hearing on a proposed municipal
ordinance entitled “Prohibition of Natural Gas Infrastructure in New Buildings”.
hearing opened at 2:10PM
zondervan spoke in support
Public comment opened at .
Public comment closed at 3:37 PM
lisa peterson, deputy city manager, spoke about school construction.
councillor kelley motion to suspend rules to extend meeting to 4:15 pm. motion passed by voice vote.
zondervan motion to refer to full city council with a favorable recommendation. motion passed by voice vote.
councillor mallon recorded in the negative.
councillor siddiqui to request that the city manager be convene stake holders to give comments on this proposed
amendment. motion passed by voice vote. councillor kelley voted in the negative
meeting adjourned at 4:12 PM
1.

That the City Manager is requested to direct the City Solicitor, Community Development, Public
Works, Inspectional Services and any other related departments to review the proposed amendments
regarding the prohibition of Natural Gas Infrastructure in New Buildings.
